message:
style(home): redesign categories into celestial orbit

- What: replace magic-circle markup with a celestial system layout and orbit tracks.
- What: restyle orbiting category planets with new halo/icon/label treatments.
- What: update responsive sizing rules for the new layout.
- Why: present categories as a more modern, space-themed navigation centerpiece.

Tests: not run (not provided)

test(e2e): point writing check to literary effect

- What: update the writing route selector to `.literary-canvas`.
- Why: match the new writing background effect.

Tests: not run (not provided)

chore(assets): add theme images and icon set

- What: add category background images and icon PNGs under `public/images`.
- What: add Gemini config files and set Playwright to run headless.
- Why: supply theme assets and keep test runs consistent.

Tests: not run (not provided)

style(theme): switch writing effect to literary

- What: update the writing theme `bgEffect` to `literary`.
- Why: align the writing category with the new literary particles.

Tests: not run (not provided)

feat(ui): add literary particle effect

- What: add `LiteraryParticles` with floating character animation.
- What: register the `literary` effect in ThemeBackground.
- Why: provide a writing-themed background effect.

Tests: not run (not provided)

fix(theme): restore full ThemeConfig structure

- What: reintroduce `layoutMode`, `fontFamily`, and `textShadow` in ThemeConfig.
- What: restore the full `themes` object after placeholder removal.
- Why: keep theme data complete and type-safe.

Tests: not run (not provided)

feat(ui): add RPG card variant for gamedev

- What: add `.card-rpg` styling with retro borders, colors, and a blinking cue.
- What: extend ThemeConfig `cardStyle` to include `rpg` and assign it to gamedev.
- Why: match gamedev cards to the pixel RPG theme.

Tests: not run (not provided)

feat(theme): add pixel background for gamedev

- What: add `PixelParticles` and register `pixel` in ThemeBackground and ThemeConfig.
- What: retune the gamedev palette and switch its background effect to pixel dust.
- Why: give the gamedev category a retro RPG vibe.

Tests: not run (not provided)

- What: register the `/gamedev` route in the router.
- Why: introduce a new category in navigation and theming.

Tests: not run (not provided)

- Why: replace text glyphs with branded imagery.

- What: increase particle count but shrink petal size and slow fall speeds.
- Why: achieve a more delicate sakura effect.

Tests: not run (not provided)

style(ui): soften audio visualizer intensity

- What: reduce visualizer height/opacity and thin bars with slower animation.

- Why: keep music effects from overpowering the page.

- What: add flip motion to petals and apply 3D scaling during render.

- What: switch anime to bubbles, writing to dust, and health to snow with updated colors.
- Why: complete theme changes missed in the previous pass.
